member.name: M:XIVLauncher.Common.Dalamud.AssetManager.CheckAssetRefreshNeeded(System.Net.Http.HttpClient,System.IO.DirectoryInfo)
member.summary: Check if an asset update is needed. When this fails, just return false - the route to github might be bad, don't wanna just bail out in that case
member.returns: Update state

member.name: M:XIVLauncher.Common.Encryption.BlockCipher.Blowfish.#ctor(System.ReadOnlySpan{System.Byte})
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the Blowfish class.
member.remarks: This function also calculates P-array and S-boxes from the given key. This is most expensive operation in blowfish algorithm.
member.param: A secret key used for blowfish. Key length must be between 32 and 448 bits.
member.exception: Length of the key is either too short or too long.

member.name: M:XIVLauncher.Common.Encryption.BlockCipher.BlowfishState.EncryptBlock(System.UInt32,System.UInt32)
member.summary: Encrypts a block.
member.param: A left side of the block.
A right side of the block.

member.name: M:XIVLauncher.Common.Encryption.BlockCipher.BlowfishState.DecryptBlock(System.UInt32,System.UInt32)
member.summary: Decrypts a block.
member.param: A left side of the block.
A right side of the blick.

member.name: M:XIVLauncher.Common.Encryption.BlockCipher.BlowfishState.InitKey(System.ReadOnlySpan{System.Byte})
member.summary: Initializes P-array and S-boxes with given key. P-array and S-boxes must be initialized to initial values beforehand.

member.name: P:XIVLauncher.Common.Encryption.BlockCipher.IBlockCipher.BlockSize
member.summary: A number of bytes that can be processed in a single operation.
member.remarks: This property is assumed to be immutable once the block cipher object is created. Breaking this assumption may cause an undefined behavior.

member.name: M:XIVLauncher.Common.Encryption.BlockCipher.IBlockCipher.EncryptBlockUnsafe(System.Byte*,System.Byte*)
member.summary: Encrypts a single block.
member.param: A pointer to the data needs to be encrypted. It must be valid to read bytes from the pointer where size is indicated by BlockSize property.
A pointer to the buffer to store the result of the operation. It must be valid to write bytes to the pointer where size is indicated by BlockSize property.
member.remarks: A pointer to input and output **can** overlap to perform in-place operation.

member.name: M:XIVLauncher.Common.Encryption.BlockCipher.IBlockCipher.DecryptBlockUnsafe(System.Byte*,System.Byte*)
member.summary: Decrypts a single block.
member.param: A pointer to the data needs to be decrypted. It must be valid to read bytes from the pointer where size is indicated by BlockSize property.
A pointer to the buffer to store the result of the operation. It must be valid to write bytes to the pointer where size is indicated by BlockSize property.
member.remarks: A pointer to input and output **can** overlap to perform in-place operation.

member.name: M:XIVLauncher.Common.Encryption.LegacyBlowfish.#ctor(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Initialize a new blowfish.
member.param: Whether or not a sign confusion should be introduced during key init. This is needed for SE's implementation of blowfish.

member.name: M:XIVLauncher.Common.Game.Launcher.GetBootVersionHash(System.IO.DirectoryInfo)
member.summary: Calculate the hash that is sent to patch-gamever for version verification/tamper protection. This same hash is also sent in lobby, but for ffxiv.exe and ffxiv_dx11.exe.
member.returns: String of hashed EXE files.

Number of threads for concurrent operation.

member.name: M:XIVLauncher.Common.Util.PlatformHelpers.IsElevationRequiredForWrite(System.IO.DirectoryInfo)
member.summary:
Check if elevation is required to write to the specified directory. This is done by attempting to write a temporary file to the directory.
Creates the directory if it does not exist.
member.returns: Whether elevation is required.
